title: doc: remove mention of Make.pkg, document CGO_CFLAGS and CGO_LDFLAGS
body:
by **junyer**: 
> The standard package makefile rules in Make.pkg automate the
> process of using cgo.  See $GOROOT/misc/cgo/stdio and
> $GOROOT/misc/cgo/gmp for examples.

`go build' just does it all automagically now, so the documentation (and the examples,
most probably) should be updated to reflect that.

Incidentally, please document `CGO_CFLAGS' and `CGO_LDFLAGS' for the benefit of those
people using libraries such as LLVM, which has its own `llvm-config' tool.
